snippet: The death, off a closed beach with no lifeguards, was the season’s first drowning off a New York City beach.
abstract: Fourteen-year-old Akeem Craig drowns in the waters off a beach in Far Rockaway, Queens, after ignoring warnings not to swim in an area with no lifeguards; Parks Dept says it is the first drowning of the season at New York City beaches.
lead_paragraph: The death, off a closed beach with no lifeguards, was the season’s first drowning off a New York City beach.

headline.seo: Boy, 14, Drowns Off Beach in Far Rockaway
headline.main: Boy, 14, Drowns Off Beach in Far Rockaway
headline.print_headline: Boy, 14, Drowns Off Beach in Far Rockaway
